overview: What's done in the dark may come to light this Christmas. Nikki, a habitual stoner facing the turmoil of turning 30 all while enduring the pressure of starting a family from her overzealous mother. A fed-up Nikki agrees to foster the lie of being pregnant with her pretentious boyfriend.
tagline: Can Nikki, a habitual stoner, stop smoking weed by Christmas?
title: Ayanna Shon's Christmas Hypnosis
